title: list-user-domains output
description: Quickly get the user domains list and their basic configuration

user-domain.title: User domain
user-domain.description: Users (and also user groups) can be uniquely identified inside a domain. An application is ususally bound to just one user domain at a time, but mulitple domains can be configured in the same cluster.

location.title: Domain hosting location
location.description: Type of domain hosting. Set to `internal` if the domain is hosted by the cluster, `external` if the domain is provided by a remote service

counters.title: Counters
counters.description: The cached number of users and groups returned by their respective last API calls

hidden_users.description: List of users that are not visible from UI and from applications

hidden_groups.description: List of groups that are not visible from UI and from applications

protocol.title: Provider protocol
protocol.description: Protocol used to communicate with the domain providers.

providers.title: Account providers
providers.description: Backend system and replicas providing the services of the user domain

unconfigured-domain.title: Unconfigured domain
unconfigured-domain.description: An account provider instance, installed as the first instance of a new domain

location.title: Domain hosting location
location.description: Type of domain hosting. Set to `internal` if the domain is hosted by the cluster, `external` if the domain is provided by a remote service

protocol.title: Provider protocol
protocol.description: Protocol used to communicate with the domain providers.

ldap-provider.title: LDAP account provider
ldap-provider.description: An LDAP account provider is a database of users and groups that can also be used as an authentication backend. A user domain is composed by at least one LDAP account provider. Multiple replicas can be instantiated on different cluster nodes.

file_server.title: The provider can be used as SMB file server too

host.title: Host name or IP address
host.description: Can be `null` if the provider is not configured properly

port.title: TCP port number
port.description: Can be `null` if the provider is not configured properly

additional-properties-of-ldap.title: LDAP domain properties
additional-properties-of-ldap.description: Additional required properties of LDAP-based domains
